title: Jeff Deuble on Christ Before Creeds
description:
Jeff Deuble is the author of "Christ Before Creeds: Rediscovering the Jesus of history": https://www.amazon.com/Christ-Before-Creeds-Rediscovering-History/dp/173691801X

We talk about Jeff's journey from being a pastor in a trinitarian denomination to changing his mind by becoming non-trinitarian, we talk about his motivations for writing his book, and how non-trinitarians should interact in a trinitarian Christian world. 

00:00:00 - Introduction
00:03:00 - Jeff's Story
00:21:10 - The emotional appeal of trinitarianism
00:31:15 - The emotional appeal of non-trinitarianism
00:35:30 - Deconstruction and Reconstruction
00:39:10 - Staying vs leaving trinitarianism after changing your mind
00:45:20 - Christ and Creeds
00:52:20 - Concluding remarks
